entity

Class Entity1_Visible

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity1_Visible
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Entity2_Movable

    public class Entity1_Visible
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    jose Entity class, which represents objects in the game. Contains position and size of the object. Allows the object to be drawn in "debug" mode.
